mapper.select: select a.aid,a.anum,a.aname,j.roleid,j.rolename,j.roledesc,j.img,t.treeid,t.treename,t.treeurl,t.treeimg,t.tree from admin_user a join jxc_role j on a.roleid=j.roleid join role_join_menu rm on j.roleid=rm.roleid join tree_menu t on t.treeid=rm.treeid join user_join_role uj on uj.aid=a.aid where a.anum=#{userName} and a.apass=#{passWord}

select * from admin_user a join jxc_role j on a.roleid=j.roleid join role_join_menu rm on j.roleid=rm.roleid join tree_menu t on t.treeid=rm.treeid join user_join_role uj on uj.aid=a.aid where a.anum=#{anum}
select t.treeurl from tree_menu t , role_join_menu rm, user_join_role ur ,admin_user au where au.anum =#{anum} and t.treeid = rm.treeid and rm.roleid = ur.roleid and ur.aid=au.aid
select * from admin_user where anum=#{userNum} and apass=#{passWord}
